metadata.title: CVE-2023-28366 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The broker in Eclipse Mosquitto 1.3.2 through 2.x before 2.0.16 has amemory leak that can be abused remotely when a client sends many QoS 2messages with duplicate message IDs, and fails to respond to PUBRECcommands. This occurs because of mishandling of EAGAIN from the libc sendfunction.

criterions.comment: mosquitto: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'backporting risks regressions').
